lines.text: Slaves! Come earn your money! Yaaarh!
[runs down the hill and single-handedly slays Ulf Bloodaxe and all but one of his men]
Do you know what will cause your own death?
Yes, something that no one would expect from a lawgiver... I will lie.
During all his years of exile, he had dreamed of Gudrun, but now Gunnar saw that he could never have her. For the first time in his life, the great warrior was beaten.
Magnus was right, the scar does protect Kjartan from the ghost.
But Ketils men don't have his luck. If they see the fire and go inside, the ghost will have meat for dinner.
